bill_title: authorize the construction of a state veterans' cemetery and to make an appropriation therefor.
keywords: Department of Military and Veterans Affairs

bill_versions.bill_text: FOR AN ACT ENTITLED, An Act to authorize the construction of a state veterans' cemetery and to make an appropriation therefor. BE IT ENACTED BY THE LEGISLATURE OF THE STATE OF SOUTH DAKOTA: Section 1. The Governor, pursuant to § 5-24-12, is hereby authorized to accept, on behalf of the State of South Dakota, the transfer of land for purposes of establishing a state veterans' cemetery east of the Missouri River. Section 2. The Department of Military and Veterans Affairs shall establish a state veterans' cemetery east of the Missouri River. Persons eligible to be buried in the state veterans' cemetery: (1) Any veteran as defined in § 33-17-1; or (2) The spouse of a qualifying veteran as defined by subdivision (1); or (3) Any member of the South Dakota National Guard. Section 3. The Division of Veterans Affairs shall promulgate rules pursuant to chapter 1-26 establishing burial eligibility, regulations, and costs for the state veterans' cemetery. Section 4. There is hereby appropriated from the general fund the sum of one hundred seventy-five thousand dollars ($175,000), or so much thereof as may be necessary, to the Department of Military and Veterans Affairs for the design, construction, and maintenance of a state veterans' cemetery. Section 5. The adjutant general shall approve vouchers and the state auditor shall draw warrants to pay expenditures authorized by this Act. Section 6. Any amount appropriated in this Act not lawfully expended or obligated by June 30, 2001, shall revert in accordance with § 4-8-21.
